summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5972 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 10, Brygger's Second Home Addition to Ballard, being the alley between Market Street and West 56th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 34th Avenue Northwest; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79832, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
